comment: Came in wanting to continue learning Italian; left wanting to get done with the class and the language as fast as possible. The busy work is fine, but the tests sucked: completely oral, must be visually recorded, and grades intensely and heavily on grammar and pronunciation which for a 1002 class felt a bit excessive.
Great professor. I had him for an online class. He was very approachable and he offers lots of extra credit. Very nice guy and a good professor.
